top.title: Four dead in Russian attack as diplomatic efforts to end war continue
top.summary: As US negotiating teams continue to hold talks with Moscow and Kyiv, Russia's attacks on Ukraine continue.

top.title: WW1 toxic compound sprayed on Georgian protesters, BBC evidence suggests
top.summary: Anti-government demonstrators are likely to have been targeted with camite, our investigation finds.

top.title: UK MP Tulip Siddiq given jail sentence in Bangladesh after trial in her absence
top.summary: The former minister and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, who received a two-year sentence, says the charges are politically motivated.

top.title: Virgin Media fined £24m for leaving vulnerable customers 'at risk of harm'
top.summary: Ofcom has fined Virgin Media after an investigation found it had left thousands of vulnerable telecare customers at risk.

top.title: Barcelona distances itself from sponsor's cryptocurrency after backlash
top.summary: Experts say the deal may put fans at risk as the Catalan club tries to relieve its financial woes.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.
